title: Face of the Gods
description: Heros Kinnhäert, king of Maäen, is still tormented by the horrors he lived during the Long War, and all he wishes is to rest in peace. But when he finds out about the terrible alliance between two great lords, he finds himself caught up in a web of conspiracies never seen before, and he won’t spare any efforts to avoid the destruction of his country…At the North, Koran K’Voöhk is a proud warrior who returns to his city after the exile that was imposed to him when he was just a boy, and what he sees upon his return is purest his Family is declining; his castle was abandoned; his enemies are even more powerful… Will he be able to reestablish the name of his Family and recover the prestige it once had?Lies, fragile bonds, false emotions, and treacherous daggers permeate a world surrounded by religion, politics, and mysterious gods.
author: Gleyzer Wendrew
